column2:
"You sure are tense, <%me>.
It's understandable that you are."
"From prosperity, there's always darkness. A society thriving across the universe, the larger the darkness."
"Lisa cannot imagine how many photons would be needed to purify such darkness."
"If asked if we could win, the answer would be that it's impossible."
"Photoners thought by sacrificing just one person, they would rescue the world."
"On the other hand, ARKS is united. To save a single person."
"To be ordered into doing something ridiculous and inefficient... Lisa likes this sort of situation."
"If we had to repeat history, there would be disillusionment... However, that didn't happen. Yes, we succeeded."
"Lisa dislikes Darkers, but also doesn't like the Photoners as well..."
"Even so, ARKS, everyone likes each other... Even you as well."

"Oh, oh oh oh...?
What's wrong? Are you ok? You look so odd, are you odd? "
"Lisa was saying odd things? Where did this come from...?"
"Lisa has always said weird things since the begining, did you know? Heheheh, ha-ha-ha."
